sourcesContent:
Employee Details

First Name:{{employee.firstName}}

Last Name:{{employee.lastName}}

AadharId:{{employee.contactNumber}}

Gender:{{employee.gender}}

Email:{{employee.email}}

Salary:{{employee.salary}}

hireDate:{{employee.hireDate}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MembersService } from 'src/app/resource-management/Services/members.service'; @Component({ selector: 'employee-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { constructor(private svc:MembersService){} employee:any | undefined; employeeId:number=1; status:boolean= false; ngOnInit(): void { this.svc.getEmployeeDetails(this.employeeId).subscribe((res)=>{ this.employee =res; console.log(res); }) } paySalary(employeeId: number){ this.svc.paySalary(this.employeeId).subscribe((res)=>{ this.status =res; console.log(res); }) } }
